MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG1 postcode area of Dumfries. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.00am to make a permanent repair to a faulty section of underground cable in Gilloch Crescent and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.34am on the 3rd of December 2020.
